DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate how the use of Tranexamic acid and Bacitracin applied to the bleeding site after the hemodialysis fistula needle is removed will affect skin wound healing.
DOC.brief_title: Use of Topical Tranexamic Acid and Bacitracin in Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Dialysis patients with fistulas (native arteriovenous) Previous sensitivity to or adverse reaction to Tranexamic acid or Bacitracin. Active infection. Stenosis of fistula.
